data.name: Warface - Free Anniversary Pack
data.detailed_description:
[h1]Warface – 5th Anniversary Pack[/h1]

This pack contains eight powerful guns – two for each class:


  • Rifleman’s VHS-2 and M16A3 for 10 days
  • Medic’s Fabarm P.S.S.10 and Saiga H.G.C. Custom for 10 days
  • Engineer’s H&K MP5A5 Custom and Magpul FMG-9 for 10 days
  • Sniper’s Gepard GM6 Lynx and Remington MSR for 10 days

5th Anniversary Pack allows you to taste the mighty weapons of Warface and ace your performance on all four classes. Time-proven classics and relatively new supernovas are up for grabs.

More about the weapons.


Rifleman’s VHS-2: Croatian VHS-2 is an improved version of VHS rifle that retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector.

Rifleman’s M16A3: M16A3 is now the standard weapon for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units.

Medic’s Fabarm P.S.S.10: Fabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun. It has an extremely high rate of fire, great accuracy, and smooth recoil.

Medic’s Saiga H.G.C. Custom: Saiga H.G.C. Custom is a 12-gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations and thus is highly customizable.

Engineer’s H&K MP5A5 Custom: H&K MP5A5 Custom is the classic configuration of H&K G36 submachine gun developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH.

Engineer’s Magpul FMG-9: Magpul FMG-9 is a prototype for a new generation of folding sub-machine guns. It has a detachable iron sight with rapid zoom and an insanely high rate of fire that make it incredibly dangerous at close quarters.

Sniper’s Gepard GM6 Lynx: Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup configuration and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower.

Sniper’s Remington MSR: Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. This a modern and precise gun that US military and several other counties have adopted into service.

5th Anniversary Pack allows you to taste the mighty weapons of Warface and ace your performance on all four classes. Time-proven classics and relatively new supernovas are up for grabs.

data.short_description: 5th Anniversary Pack allows you to taste the mighty weapons of Warface and ace your performance on all four classes. Time-proven classics and relatively new supernovas are up for grabs.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
